seasons.name: Banquet 「Yume」Kaiseki  with Live Ise Lobster & A5 Kagoshima Wagyu
seasons.text1:
When it comes to Tsukiyoiwa, crab is the first thing that comes to mind……
We are pleased to announce that Tsukiyoiwa will now be offering a new course that combines the highly popular and luxurious ingredients: live Ise lobster and A5-grade Kagoshima beef, alongside our famous crab dishes.
Our head chef, Fukushima, is not just a crab specialist; he is a master of Japanese kaiseki cuisine with many years of training in Kyoto. This expert chef uses his exceptional skills to create a perfect harmony between the unique tenderness and sweetness of live Ise lobster and the rich flavor and texture of A5-grade Kagoshima beef, bringing out the best of both ingredients.
We invite you to indulge in our new course, crafted with the utmost care by Chef Fukushima, and savor the exquisite flavors of these carefully selected premium ingredients from both the sea and the land.
seasons.text2:
「「Yume」Kaiseki  with Live Ise Lobster & A5 Kagoshima Wagyu」
Price: 7,800 NTD/person 
Supply period: From Thursday, June 20th～

seasons.name: Banquet Kaiseki with Live King Crab
seasons.text1:
Looking for an excellent venue for group dining? Why not taste our kaiseki with live king crab!

With the significant increase in dining-out demand worldwide after the end of the COVID-19 pandemic, the cost of ingredients continues to rise. Among them, the price increase and unstable supply of king crab are particularly noticeable. However, in order to let our guests to enjoy king crab at reasonable prices as much as possible, we have introduced this special course. Welcome to Tsukiyoiwa to enjoy the deliciousness of king crab.

Whether it's a family gathering, a dinner with friends, or a business banquet, we can provide you with a warm and comfortable dining environment and a first-class culinary experience. At Tsukiyoiwa you can relax and enjoy a wonderful time with your loved ones or share delicious food with important business partners, and enjoy a pleasant dining experience.
seasons.text2:
「Banquet Kaiseki with Live King Crab」
Price: 8,800 NTD/person (minimum 4 people)
Supply period: From April 22nd～
seasons.text3:
*This course does not include private chef service
*The content of the course is the same as the original 「Kaiseki with Live King Crab」 priced at 9,800 NTD/person.

name:
Kaiseki with
Live Snow Crab &
Live King Crab
text1:
Experience the ultimate live crab course where you can enjoy both live Snow Crab and live King Crab in one exquisite package!

Our chefs will personally prepare the two live crabs right in front of you. Not only can you savor the distinct textures of both live crabs simultaneously, but the diverse cooking methods will also delight your taste buds. This is TsukiyoIwa's premier and unrivaled live crab course!
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Soup, Main Course, Six dishes featuring live Snow Crab and live King Crab, and Dessert.
text3:
*Due to the need for onsite preparation, this course is available for lunch at 11:30 am and 12:00 pm, and for dinner at 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm.

* The chef will personally prepare the dishes inside the private room, and the dining time is approximately two and a half hours. If guests have limited time, please inform us during the reservation, and we will adjust the serving time accordingly.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.

name:
Kaiseki with
Live Snow Crab & Lobster
text1:
Experience the luxury of savoring two top-notch delicacies from the sea at once – live snow Crab and Ise lobster.

Tsukiyoiwa's signature live King Crab kaiseki, prepared onsite treatment, is paired with the auspicious lobster, symbolizing longevity. This is a luxurious feast that one must indulge in at least once in a lifetime.
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Main Course, Three dishes featuring live Ise lobster, Six dishes featuring live snow Crab, and Dessert.
text3:
*Due to the need for onsite preparation, this course is available for lunch at 11:30 am and 12:00 pm, and for dinner at 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm.

* The chef will personally prepare the dishes inside the private room, and the dining time is approximately two and a half hours. If guests have limited time, please inform us during the reservation, and we will adjust the serving time accordingly.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.

name:
Kaiseki with
Wagyu Beef &
Live Snow Crab
text1:
A dream combination of live Snow Crab kaiseki and the finest A5 Wagyu beef!

We have prepared the most premium ingredients from both land and sea! Coupled with the expertise of our craftsman chefs who will personally prepare live Snow Crab and Japan's finest A5 Wagyu beef right in front of you, this is a dreamy and extravagant feast that will truly satisfy your taste buds.
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Soup, Three dishes featuring A5 Wagyu beef, Five dishes featuring live cod, and Dessert.
text3:
*Due to the need for onsite preparation, this course is available for lunch at 11:30 am and 12:00 pm, and for dinner at 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm.

* The chef will personally prepare the dishes inside the private room, and the dining time is approximately two and a half hours. If guests have limited time, please inform us during the reservation, and we will adjust the serving time accordingly.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.

name:
Kaiseki with
live Snow Crab
text1:
Experience the exquisite blend of fresh and delicate live Snow Crab, infused with its rich and savory crab roe, allowing the true essence of the Snow Crab's flavor to shine in this delightful course!

Indulge in the luxury of having one live Snow Crab per person, expertly prepared by our craftsman chefs. Enjoy the delicate and succulent crab meat spread generously over the crab shell, along with the heavenly essence of the full Snow Crab roe. The perfect conclusion to this extraordinary experience is the heartwarming crab shell mixed rice.
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Soup, Main Course, Six dishes featuring live Matsuba Crab, and Dessert.
text3:
*Due to the need for onsite preparation, this course is available for lunch at 11:30 am and 12:00 pm, and for dinner at 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm.

* The chef will personally prepare the dishes inside the private room, and the dining time is approximately two and a half hours. If guests have limited time, please inform us during the reservation, and we will adjust the serving time accordingly.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.

name:
Kaiseki with
Live King Crab
text1:
Indulge in a visually and gastronomically satisfying Kaiseki course, where our craftsman chefs will personally handle the live King Crab right in front of you.

Experience various delightful preparations, from sashimi, grilling, hot pot, to frying, all designed to bring out the absolute freshness and deliciousness of the crab. This is a luxurious crab Kaiseki course rarely seen in Taiwan.
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Soup, Main Course, Six dishes featuring live cod, and Dessert.
text3:
*Due to the need for onsite preparation, this course is available for lunch at 11:30 am and 12:00 pm, and for dinner at 6:00 pm and 7:00 pm.

* The chef will personally prepare the dishes inside the private room, and the dining time is approximately two and a half hours. If guests have limited time, please inform us during the reservation, and we will adjust the serving time accordingly.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.

name:
TSUKIYOIWA Kaiseki with
Seasonal Live Crab
text1:
Embark on a luxurious Kaiseki journey featuring our carefully selected seasonal live crabs, with Snow Crab taking the lead.

Tsukiyoiwa selects different live crabs each season, allowing you to savor a variety of crab flavors. For instance, the Snow Crab is praised as the 'Queen of Crabs' for its tender, juicy, and flavorful meat.

Under the skilled hands of our Japanese Head Chef, Mr. Fukushima, each type of crab is prepared to perfection, ensuring that you experience the most exquisite taste.
text2: Course Includes: Appetizer, Soup, Main Course, Four dishes featuring live seasonal crabs, and Dessert.
text3:
Kaiseki with Seasonal Live Crab species is subject to availability and cannot be specified.

* If there are any allergies or dietary restrictions, please inform us when making the reservation.

*  Each set menu accepts reservations for more than two people. Every group must order from the same set menu.
